data.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
data.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.

relatedRecords.name: Community Building: Level Up WI
